This Chrome extension offers a refined and organized approach to bookmark management through a workspace-based system, also available in the Chrome side panel. Users can create and customize multiple workspaces, each with its own layout, making it easy to search and navigate bookmarks based on individual needs.

The extension is designed to enhance productivity and personalization with an intuitive structure and elegant theme.
